biocXqtl: modular system for creating molecular QTL statistics

Source: R/biocXqtl-package.R
biocXqtl-package.Rd

This is a modular system for creating molecular QTL statistics. Given a RangedSummarizedExperiment with assay elements comprised of molecular responses like RNA-seq counts, and genotype calls in colData, results of association tests will be bound into the rowData of the input RangedSummarizedExperiment.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/vjcitn/biocXqtl

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/vjcitn/biocXqtl/issues
